text.obsolecence.notificationsconsent: I would like to receive obsolecence notifications about products I have purchased in the past.
text.orderinfoandupdates.consent: I consent to the processing of my personal data to send me information about my order and products I have ordered recently.
text.orderinfoandupdates.question: How would you like to be kept up to date?
text.preferences.privacy.policy: Details on processing of your personal data can be found in our Privacy Policy.
text.preferences.receive.communication: I would like to receive communications by email
text.preferences.sms: I would like to receive communications by SMS
text.preferences.phone: I would like to receive communications by phone
text.preferences.post: I would like to receive communications by post
text.preferences.personalise.content: We would like to personalise the content you see on the Distrelec web shop and in our communications. If you choose not to accept you will still see content and ads but they may not be relevant to your needs.
text.preferences.receive.personalised: I would like to receive personalised communications based on my account information, on-site activity and purchase history
text.preferences.profiling.data: We would like to match profiling data from third parties with the information you provide to help us predict what products and services are most relevant to your role and your company.
text.preferences.combine.data: I am happy for Distrelec to combine my data with data from it's partners to deliver an enhanced customer experience both on the web shop and on other websites
text.registration.accept.registering: You must accept these terms before registering.
text.login.colleague: As a colleague at your company or a member of the Distrelec team created your account, we need you to confirm you're happy with our terms and conditions and tell us how we can contact you in future.
text.login.guest: Now that you have registered, we need you to confirm that you are happy with our terms and conditions and tell us how we can contact you in future.
text.login.dont.worry: Don't worry, it's really easy and will only take a minute or two.
text.preferences.cookie.consent: Distrelec and our partners use cookies and other technologies to deliver our online services, enhance your user experience, personalise content and advertising and provide social media features.
text.preferences.find.out.more: You can find out more about how we use your data in this way in our privacy policy and cookie policy.
text.preferences.any.choice: Any choices you make now can be updated by clicking the 'manage cookies' link at the bottom of every page on the web shop.
text.preferences.operate: Operate the web shop and core services
text.preferences.cookie.info: These cookies and other technologies are used to operate the core services of the Distrelec web shop. Without them the web shop will not function correctly so they can only be disabled in your browser settings.
text.preferences.analyse: We use these to analyse site usage, how customers use the site and measure the web shop's performance. Without them Distrelec will not have the insight needed to improve our online services.
text.preferences.without: Without these we won't be able to remember your cart contents between visits, your language preferences, how many search results you like to view on a page and other settings that make our web shop easier to use.
text.preferences.accept.recommended: Accept recommended settings (this will set all toggles to 'yes')
text.preferences.newsletter.notice: We notice you're not registered to receive our email newsletters.
text.preferences.newsletter.privacy: The Distrelec privacy policy explains when and why we collect personal information about you, how we use it, how we keep it secure and your right to see or remove the data we hold about you. You can change your communication preferences at any time.
text.preferences.newsletter.updates: Subscribe for regular updates including special benefits and discounts.
text.preferences.newsletter.keep.to.date: We'll keep you up-to-date with all the latest news from Distrelec and our suppliers plus information on events, offers, new products and promotions.
text.preferences.newsletter.review: You can review your communication preferences at any time by visiting the 'my account' section of the Distrelec web shop.
text.preferences.newsletter.receive: Choose what you want to receive
text.preferences.newsletter.send.out: We send out newsletters on a variety of subjects. We'll assume you are interested in everything, but you can choose which newsletters you receive by visiting the 'my account' section of the Distrelec web shop.
text.preferences.newsletter.permission: Our newsletters often contain product suggestions - if you give us permission we can personalise these so that they are relevant to your role and industry. We do this based on your account information, purchase history and on-site behaviour.
text.preferences.newsletter.document.fin: Finally, please take a moment to read the Distrelec privacy policy as this document explains when and why we collect personal information about you, how we use it, how we keep it, how we keep it secure and your rights to see or remove the data we hold about you.
text.preferences.newsletter.best.way: The best way to manage your communications is to create an account on the Distrelec web shop. You'll be able to pick what subjects you want to receive newsletters about and choose to personalise your communications to your role and industry.
text.preferences.newsletter.description: With a Distrelec web shop account you will also be able to place orders online, manage project lists and request quotations quickly and easily.
text.preferences.newsletter.prerfer: If you prefer not to create an account you can simply click the 'unsubscribe' link at the bottom of every email newsletter we send.
text.preferences.newsletter.document: Please take a moment to read the Distrelec privacy policy as this document explains when and why we collect personal information about you, how we use it, how we keep it secure and your right to see or remove the data we hold about you.
text.preferences.saved: Your communication preferences have been saved
text.preferences.error: An error occurred while saving your preferences. Please try again.
text.preference.communication.error: We seem to be having difficulty retrieving your account information. Please refresh the page and try again and if the problem persists, please contact us.
text.preferences.disclaimer: To opt-in for this preference, please visit My Account Information to ensure we have your correct contact details.
text.preferences.sms.disclaimer: I would like to receive communication via phone / sms / post to hear / receive information about new brands, products, services and promotions.
text.preferences.personalization.disclai: Based on your interactions with the site / web shop, product and brand preferences and sales interactions, we can send you emails that are personalised to you.
text.registration.accept.privacy: I accept the Terms and Conditions.
text.preferences.terms.error: You must accept the terms and conditions in order to register with Distrelec
text.preferences.presubscribed.lock: You have not responded to the double opt-in email, therefore you are unable to change your preferences at this time. If you need to resend the double opt-in email please click here. Please allow up to 30 minutes for the email to arrive.
text.preferences.existing.question: IF YOU ARE AN EXISTING CUSTOMER
text.preferences.new.question: IF YOU ARE A NEW CUSTOMER
text.preferences.updated.existing.messag: You have successfully updated your preferences and will now receive communications from the Distrelec family. Based on your subscriptions you can benefit from our unique newsletter full of information on the latest news and trends in your industry as well as some great offers and personalised content.
Please note that our newsletter will be sent to you in English.
You can make changes to your preferences by clicking on the link below or visiting the My Account section of the web shop.
text.preferences.updated.new.message.1: We are happy you have decided to receive our Distrelec family newsletter, offering you all the latest news and trends in your industry as well as having access to some great offers.
text.preferences.updated.new.message.2: If you are new to Distrelec, we would like to invite you to get started with an account. Signing up is easy and gives you access to personalised content. Just click on the link below to get started.
text.preferences.updated.below: Please confirm you are happy for us to communicate with you via email by clicking on the link we have just sent to the address below:
text.preferences.email.sentTo: The double opt-in email will be sent to the following address : {{0}}
text.preferences.incorrect.notice: If this is not correct please alter your account information and click the link again to re-send the double opt-in email.
text.preferences.recieve.notice: You are not receiving personalised communications because you have not responded to the double opt-in email. If you need to resend the double opt-in email please click here. Please allow up to 30 minutes for the email to arrive.
text.preferences.respond.notice: You have not responded to the double opt-in email. If you need to resend it, please click here.
text.preferences.subscribe: I would like to be subscribed to the following
text.preferences.optIn.notice: Please note that you need to opt-in to "I would like to receive communications by email" before we are able to send you newsletters.
text.preferences.newsletter.disclaimer: Distrelec would like to keep you up-to-date with news, events, offers, new products, promotions and catalogues. Distrelec may also send you personalised recommendations as well as feedback surveys to understand more about you and your experience with Distrelec.
text.preferences.newsletter.disclaimer.a: You can change your communication preferences at any time after registering.
text.preferences.following.newsletter.re: I would like to receive following newsletters
text.preferences.personalise.content.leg: Based on your interactions with the web shop, sales, product and brand preferences, we would like to personalise your experience with Distrelec.
text.preferences.profiling.data.legal: We would like to match profiling data from third parties such as Google, LinkedIn, Facebook and other trusted partners to help us select content that fits your interests that we will display in communications, on our websites and within third party and partner sites.
text.quote.changes.restricted: Quantity changes may be restricted on some quoted items
text.quote.empty: Please provide a comment for the quote
text.quote.expired: This Quote cannot be accepted as it has expired
text.quotes.comments.label: Quotes Comments Details
text.quotes.orderStatusDetails.label: Quote Status Details
text.whatAreYouLookingForToday: What are you looking for today?
